root: ^Heyy, since you're up, would you mind running a little errand for me?

g-0: ^Great! When you have time, go ahead and run up to Mallory's place.
^She was supposed to supply us with a shipment of iron yesterday, but I haven't heard from her.
^I won't be able to work the forge without that iron. Just make sure she's okay. Thanks, Lamaas!
